faceScanning.loginSubtitle: Scan your face to access your account

faceDuplicate.title: DUPLICATE DETECTED
faceDuplicate.subtitle: Similar face data found in our system
faceDuplicate.description: Our system has detected similar biometric data already exists in our database.
faceDuplicate.tryAgain: This could be due to lighting conditions or positioning. Please try scanning again.
faceDuplicate.helpText: For best results, ensure good lighting and look directly at the camera
